title: Localize Yoroi for Bulgaria
description: 現在、ヨロイにはブルガリア語のインターフェイスがないため、一般の方にはアクセスしにくい状況にあります。

f6_assessments.q0: Great small project to localize Yoroi wallet for Bulgaria. These types of localizations are imperative for Cardano to be successful across the world.
f6_assessments.q1: This is a simple low cost plan. There is no reason to believe the developers cannot deliver upon it.
f6_assessments.q2: Simple plan, deliver the Bulgarian localization. Progress easy to audit. Success could be measured afterwards by the number of downloads / usages of the localized app.

f6_assessments.q0: Idea is clear and precise, and accomplishes the task of expanding usage of the system which benefits everyone
f6_assessments.q1: Experience seems decent enough and the task is small enough that I am confident they will be able to get this done
f6_assessments.q2: There is sufficient information and plan. Since this is a changing system. The idea of a 1 year additional maintenance is a good idea. Hopefully they can continue after a year with additional funding

f6_assessments.q0: Native language support is a much-needed feature for improving the onboarding of both developer and user. Therefore translating one of the most used wallets to Bulgaria which is an important country for blockchain industry can improve the exposure of Cardano at a relatively low cost.
f6_assessments.q1: The task is relatively simple and can be performed by devs with knowledge of Bulgarian. The proposals claim to be an international software development team. Therefore it can be seen that there is a high chance of implementing the proposal in the best possible manner.
f6_assessments.q2: The construction of a language pack or mapping for Yorai is fairly a simple task provided the availability of the language experts.  The progress can be easily monitored and measured. The success may take some time and can be measured based on the number of Bulgarians shifting to this language pack.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal could understand the importance of the Yoroi's wallet traduction  for the adoption of the Cardano ecosystem globally.  However, is limited the information about the skilsl or experience of the proposers for implement the proposal.
f6_assessments.q1:
-	The proposer mention relevant skills and experience of the team in charge of the proposal but not provide references or links for check that information.  The proposal does not provided specific details about the team in charge of the implementation.

-	 The proposer does not provide a budget clearly outline and broken down into identifiable items.

-	The proposer does not provide a sensible and conductible plan for implementation that shows not only what is being done but also how.

-	The plan does not describe the resources necessary to implement the proposal. 

-	The proposal does not clearly explain technical aspects like architecture, language and tecnologies if they are crucial for implementation

-	The proposer has not considered challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation.
f6_assessments.q2:
-	The proposal does not provided a roadmap with milestones for the follow-up of the proposal.

-	The proposer does not present metrics/KPIs that define the success of the proposal.

solution: Yoroiのインターフェース全体をブルガリア語に翻訳し、その内容をGitHubのオープンソースプロジェクトに投稿します。
experience: 私たちは、様々な技術領域での経験を持つ、現在フリーランスで活動している国際的なソフトウェア開発チームです。
